titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the A historical & chronological system or conspectus of the Slavonian churches, 1800s

did.unittitle: A historical & chronological system or conspectus of the Slavonian churches

repository.corpname: The New York Public Library. Manuscripts and Archives Division.

address.addressline: Fifth Avenue at 42nd Street, New York, NY 10018-2788

did.abstract: Collection consists of 19th century manuscript copy (translated from Latin) of A historical & chronological system or conspectus of the Slavonian churches throughout various provinces, especially Poland, Bohemia, Lithuania, Russia, Prussia, Moravia ... containing an ecclesiastical history from the time of Christ & the apostles to the year 1650, by Adrian Regenvolski (real author Andrev Wengerski). Original work was completed after the author's death by his brother Thomas. Includes personal name index.

scopecontent.p: Collection consists of 19th century manuscript copy (translated from Latin) of A historical & chronological system or conspectus of the Slavonian churches throughout various provinces, especially Poland, Bohemia, Lithuania, Russia, Prussia, Moravia ... containing an ecclesiastical history from the time of Christ & the apostles to the year 1650, by Adrian Regenvolski (real author Andrev Wengerski). Original work was completed after the author's death by his brother Thomas. Includes personal name index.

prefercite.p: A historical & chronological system or conspectus of the Slavonian churches ., Manuscripts and Archives Division, The New York Public Library
